A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Between Luke Skywalkers cowardice\, finding our hero suckling at the teet of an alien space cow\, yoda the book burner?\, Laura Dern's purple commadress hotttie-fly-boy commentary\, Leia going all Kal-El\, a shirtless Kylo Ren\, sub-plots of sobplotted sub-plots\, Rey who?\, this movie was exhausting. The only redeeming quality was the music of John Williams. All in all\, this movie Sucked!
